prompt: Chiikawastyle,Usagi,This is a digital drawing featuring Usagi, an anthropomorphic bunny character with a round, chubby body and large, expressive eyes. Usagi has light beige fur, pink blush marks on the cheeks, and is wearing a pair of large, orange headphones with white ear cushions. The bunny is holding a white lotus flower in both paws. The background is a soft pink gradient with small, yellow, diamond-shaped sparkles. The style is cute and cartoonish, with bold black outlines and simple, flat colors.
